title: Multi-Platform Communication Aggregation

problem.en: Users communicate across multiple platforms (email, Slack, iMessage) and need to search for information that might exist in any of them. Searching each manually is slow and error-prone.
problem.ko: 사용자는 여러 플랫폼(이메일, Slack, iMessage)에서 소통하며 어디에든 존재할 수 있는 정보를 검색해야 합니다. 각각을 수동으로 검색하는 것은 느리고 오류가 발생하기 쉽습니다.

solution.en: Create unified search interface that queries all communication platforms in parallel and aggregates results into consistent format with platform adapters, parallel dispatch, and result normalization.
solution.ko: 플랫폼 어댑터, 병렬 디스패치, 결과 정규화를 통해 모든 통신 플랫폼을 병렬로 쿼리하고 결과를 일관된 형식으로 집계하는 통합 검색 인터페이스를 생성합니다.

mermaid_diagram:
graph TD
    A[User Query] --> B[Aggregator Agent]
    B --> C[iMessage Search]
    B --> D[Slack Search]
    B --> E[Email Search]
    C --> F[Result Collector]
    D --> F
    E --> F
    F --> G[Unified Results Table]
code_example:
# Unified search implementation
search_all() {
    query="$1"
    
    # Spawn parallel searches
    messages search "$query" > /tmp/messages.json &
    slack-search "$query" > /tmp/slack.json &
    gmail-search "$query" > /tmp/gmail.json &
    
    wait  # All complete
    
    # Aggregate and normalize to common schema:
    # {platform, sender, timestamp, content, url}
    aggregate_results /tmp/*.json
}
